title: Heritage Five-Star Grandeur in the Heart of the City
description: Discover the rich artistic heritage, Imperial palaces and café culture of Austria’s beautiful capital Vienna, staying in five-star grandeur at the historic Palais Hansen Kempinski Vienna - fabulously located on the Ring Boulevard for discovering all of the city’s sights. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, an indulgent three-course dining experience with a complimentary glass of wine each, a welcome drink on arrival and a relaxing express massage each.

title: Five-Star Grandeur in the Heart of Vienna
description: Indulge in elegant Austrian luxury at the historic Grand Hotel, Vienna, located in the heart of the city on the famous boulevard Vienna Ringstrasse near the Vienna State Opera and the iconic Kaerntner shopping street. Spend three nights in an opulent Exclusive Room and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, a three-course dining experience and welcome drinks on arrival.

title: Central Vienna Heritage Stay near Hofburg Palace with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Behind the stately facade of a heritage building, this hotel unfolds as a masterpiece of refined luxury. At its heart, the signature Donnersmarkt Restaurant celebrates plant-forward Austrian cuisine with a modern twist, while the intimate Donnersmarkt Bar crafts signature cocktails paired with light bites.

Wellness seekers will find solace in the exclusive spa sanctuary, complete with a Finnish sauna, steam room and treatment suites offering bespoke therapies. The enchanting Stadtpark is right on your doorstep, offering a verdant escape home to the golden statue of Johann Strauss, with St Stephen's Cathedral and the boutiques of Kärntner Strasse within walking distance.

title: European Elegance in the Heart of Vienna
description: Experience the art, culture and history of Austria's elegant capital of Vienna with a three-night stay at the Grand Ferdinand Vienna. Includes daily buffet breakfasts, welcome drinks and complimentary Wi-Fi.

title: Heritage Central Vienna Boutique Stay near Hofburg Palace with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Behind the stately facade of a heritage building, this hotel unfolds as a masterpiece of refined luxury. At its heart, the signature Donnersmarkt Restaurant celebrates Austrian cuisine with a modern twist, while the intimate Donnersmarkt Bar crafts signature cocktails paired with plant-forward light bites.

Wellness seekers will find solace in the exclusive spa sanctuary, complete with a Finnish sauna, steam room and treatment suites offering bespoke therapies. The enchanting Stadtpark is right on your doorstep, offering a verdant escape that's home to the golden statue of Johann Strauss, with St Stephen's Cathedral and the boutiques of Kärntner Strasse within walking distance.

title: Elegant City Stay in the Heart of Vienna
description: Experience the art, elegance and rich history of Vienna with a glamorous stay at the Grand Ferdinand Vienna - a boutique hotel perfectly located on the iconic Ringstrasse, the heart of the city. Your European getaway includes daily buffet breakfast and a welcome drink on arrival to toast your escape.

title: Charming Vienna Haven near Historic Prater Amusement Park
description: For a delightful escape blending modernity and Viennese charm, plus a touch of whimsy, head to voco Vienna Prater, an IHG Hotel, an urban stay located just a five-minute drive from one of Europe's oldest amusement parks - Prater. After a day spent atop the Ferris wheel or admiring the perfectly preserved attractions of Prater, head back to the hotel for a classic cocktail at the onsite Bluebird Bar or a hearty meal at Vienna Vibe restaurant.
location_description: voco Vienna Prater, an IHG Hotel

title: Central Vienna Heritage Stay near Karlskirche with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description:
Step into refined Viennese elegance just steps from the world-renowned Musikverein and the grand Vienna State Opera. Each artfully designed room at Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna - MGallery pays homage to the city’s rich musical heritage, with bespoke furnishings and curated artwork reflecting the creative spirit of Austria’s capital.

Begin your day with a gourmet breakfast at APRON, the hotel’s Michelin-starred restaurant, or stroll to the Belvedere Palace to admire Klimt’s masterpieces. In the evening, enjoy expertly crafted cocktails at the chic onsite bar before exploring the vibrant Naschmarkt’s eclectic food stalls and artisan shops.

title: Heritage Kempinski Palace Grandeur in the Heart of Vienna
description: Discover the rich artistic heritage, Imperial palaces and café culture of Austria’s beautiful capital Vienna, staying in five-star grandeur at the historic Palais Hansen Kempinski Vienna - fabulously located on the Ring Boulevard for discovering all of the city’s sights. Austria’s capital is famed for its classical music heritage and Imperial palaces. Discover the sights of this beautiful city, including the Schonbrunn Palace, Ringstrasse, the Empress Maria Theresia Monument, Votive Church, City Hall, Parliament and the State Opera House, all within easy reach of your palatial-style grand hotel. After busy days exploring the city, retreat to Palais Hansen Kempinski, one of Vienna’s finest hotels where history meets contemporary luxury. Guests can take advantage of two elegant restaurants, two bars and a cigar lounge, a grand ballroom and an Ottoman-style spa, Kempinski the Spa.

title: Eclectic 7th District Vienna Designer Escape
description:
The beauty of Vienna is yours to discover from the sophisticated, casual-chic Max Brown 7th District. Perfectly positioned in the hip seventh district, this hip hotel is in a privileged location near quirky cafés, bars and vintage boutiques.

Bright, playful and wildly fun, Max Brown 7th District is beautifully styled - fusing contemporary comfort with quirky, original touches and vivid colours. From forest-green walls and deep teal ceilings to floral velour furnishings and exposed brick, every aspect has been carefully thought through, to winning effect. With an abundance of renowned eateries, bookstores,  museums, art and craft shops and iconic sights within easy reach and modern amenities including an award-winning restaurant, friendly bar, photo booth, and a beautiful old-style cinema room that hosts complimentary weekly film screenings, Max Brown 7th District is the perfect place for an exciting city break.

title: Five-Star Vienna City Escape Overlooking Stadtpark near Vienna State Opera
description: Visit the motherland of musical masterpieces and coffee-house culture when you stay at the five-star InterContinental Vienna, an IHG Hotel, placed moments from iconic sights like the world-renowned Vienna State Opera and the stylish shopping district Kaerntner Strasse. Beyond the crystal chandeliers and classic décor are the exceptional Intermezzo Bar - a sultry cocktail den - and the eclectic Parlor restaurant, serving up Austrian and international specialties.

title: Luxurious Heritage Vienna Escape in the Heart of the City with Rooftop Terrace and Grand Spa
description: Welcome to the elegant and exquisite Grand Hotel Wien, an IHG Hotel,  nestled in the heart of vibrant Vienna. With a history dating back to 1870, this impressive gem has been lovingly restored to include 205 rooms and suites, seven restaurants and bars, a state-of-the-art spa and a spectacular rooftop summer terrace. Just moments away from the world-renowned Vienna State Opera and the shopping mile of Kaerntner Strasse, it couldn't be better placed for a relaxing city break.
location_description: Grand Hotel Wien, an IHG Hotel

title: Vibrant Vienna Urban Retreat with Stunning Rooftop Garden
description: Vienna's buzzing city centre is just a stone's throw from the ultra-stylish Hotel Indigo Vienna - Naschmarkt, an IHG Hotel. Discover a rooftop garden, a leafy courtyard and a terrace, all within walking distance from the state opera and the museums on the Ringstrasse. Hidden among the hotel's secret gardens is the celebrated Pigment restaurant, a must-try venue in Vienna that prides itself on its simple, locally sourced dishes presented in a new and innovative way.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Vienna - Naschmarkt, an IHG Hotel

title: Playful Designer Vienna Hotel in Trendy MuseumsQuartier District with Rooftop Bar & Spa
description:
Step into the creative heart of Vienna at this trendy stay, where the city’s renowned museums and the historic Ringstrasse are just a stroll away. After exploring the Leopold Museum or the Museum of Natural History, retreat to the sauna before sampling Italian fare at RIBELLI Restaurant.

Later, borrow a bicycle to explore the cobbled streets and grand architecture of the city, grab a bite in the burger garden or journey to the hotel's rooftop bar for live music and Austrian wines with views over this historic city.

title: Five-Star City Break in the Heart of Vienna with Onsite Spa & Swimming Pool
description:
Nestled in the heart of Vienna's cultural and artistic city centre, you’ll find Hotel Sans Souci Vienna, an elegant hotel ranked in the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. Across 63 beautifully appointed rooms and suites, Hotel Sans Souci Vienna features eclectic design elements, including stunning modern art pieces and bold splashes of purple, the colour of royalty. And just like royalty, you’ll be treated to five-star facilities, such as the gilded, chandelier-strewn Le Bar, serving up handcrafted cocktails and distinguished vintage wines. In summer, Le Bar moves into the sunshine, transforming into a champagne terrace where you can enjoy a sparkling drink. Indulge in a romantic Candlelight Dinner at Veranda restaurant and feast on plates of mouthwatering modern Austrian cuisine. When you want to unwind, head to the indoor swimming pool, set in a calming, cave-like space, and swim beneath sparkling chandeliers or visit the Spa, where treatmeants and massages await.

While the sophisticated luxury of the hotel is sure to keep you captivated, the location promises an enriching escape full of art and culture. Just two minutes’ walk from the hotel, you’ll find the MuseumsQuartier Wien, one of the largest districts for contemporary art in the world. After you’ve wandered through the vast array of cultural institutions, head to Mariahilfer Strasse, a trendy shopping district where you’ll discover quaint designer stores and 19th-century architecture just a five-minute walk from the hotel.

title: Trendy Vienna Escape with Spectacular City Views Close to Naschmarkt
description: The beauty, history, and culture of Austria create a captivating allure that can only be satisfied with a stay at Holiday Inn Vienna City, an IHG Hotel. Found in the heart of the Freihausviertel district, close to the capital's city centre, this modern escape is perfectly placed for days spent admiring Imperial architecture and enjoying culinary delights and fine local wines in elegant restaurants. Closer to home, hearty Austrian meals are on offer at the onsite Wiener Moderne restaurant, showcasing Viennese delicacies like Wiener Schnitzel and apple strudel.
location_description: Holiday Inn Vienna City, an IHG Hotel
